00024 #include<iostream>
00025 #include<stdlib.h>
00026 #include<string.h>
00027 #include<pthread.h>
00028 #include<errno.h>
00029 
00030 using namespace std;
00035 void* counting_thread_fun(void * thread_data);
00036 
00041 void error(string msg);
00042 
00048 int main(int argc,char *argv[]);
00049 
00051 typedef struct
00052 {
00053         char * bigString;
00054         char * subString;
00055         int bigStringLength;
00056         int subStringLength;
00057 }COUNTING_THREAD_DATA;
00058 
00059 
00060 pthread_mutex_t counting_mutex=PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00061 
00062 static int match_count=0;
00063 
00064 int NO_OF_THREADS=1;
00065 
00066 void error(string msg)
00067 {
00068         cerr<<msg<<strerror(errno);
00069         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void* counting_thread_fun(void * thread_data)
00073 {
00074         COUNTING_THREAD_DATA *data=(COUNTING_THREAD_DATA*) thread_data;
00075         for(int i=0;i<data->bigStringLength;i++)
00076         {
00077                 bool mismatch=false;
00078                 for(int j=0,k=i;j<data->subStringLength;j++,k++)
00079                 {
00080 
00081                         if(data->bigString[k]=='\0' || data->bigString[k]!=data->subString[j])
00082                         {
00083                                 mismatch=true;
00084                                 break;
00085                         }
00086                 }
00087                 if(!mismatch)
00088                 {
00089                         pthread_mutex_lock(&counting_mutex);
00090                         match_count++;
00091                         //cout<<"thread "<<pthread_self()%NO_OF_THREADS<<"found match\n";
00092                         pthread_mutex_unlock(&counting_mutex);
00093                 }
00094         }
00095         return NULL;
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 int main(int argc,char *argv[])
00100 {
00101         if(argc!=3)
00102         {
00103                 cout<<"usage: Occurrences <BigString> <SubString>\n";
00104                 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00105         }
00106         char *bigString=argv[1];
00107         char *subString=argv[2];
00108         int l;
00109         for(l=0;bigString[l]!='\0';l++);
00110         int bigStringLength=l;
00111         for(l=0;subString[l]!='\0';l++);
00112         int subStringLength=l;
00113 
00114         if(bigStringLength<subStringLength)
00115         {
00116                 cout<<"\n Length of Big String can not be smaller than Sub String ";
00117                 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00118         }
00119 
00120         cout<<"Enter Number of threads to count occurrences\t";
00121         cin>>NO_OF_THREADS;
00122         if(NO_OF_THREADS<=1)
00123         {
00124                 cout<<"For Parallel counting no of threads should be greater than one";
00125                 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00126         }
00127         pthread_t thread_id[NO_OF_THREADS];
00128         COUNTING_THREAD_DATA thread_data[NO_OF_THREADS];// COUNTING_THREAD_DATA array for containing thread argument data
00129         int div=bigStringLength/NO_OF_THREADS+1;
00130         while(div<subStringLength)
00131         {
00132                 NO_OF_THREADS--;
00133                 div=bigStringLength/NO_OF_THREADS+1;
00134         }
00135         if(bigStringLength-div*(NO_OF_THREADS-1) < subStringLength)
00136                 NO_OF_THREADS--;
00137         for(int i=0;i<NO_OF_THREADS;i++)
00138         {
00139                 thread_data[i].bigString=bigString+div*i;
00140                 thread_data[i].subString=subString;
00141                 thread_data[i].bigStringLength=div;
00142                 thread_data[i].subStringLength=subStringLength;
00143                 if(pthread_create(&thread_id[i], NULL, counting_thread_fun, (void *)&thread_data[i]))
00144                 {
00145                         string msg="ERROR; return code from pthread_create()";
00146                         error(msg);
00147                 }
00148         }
00149         for(int i=0;i<NO_OF_THREADS;i++)
00150         {
00151                 pthread_join(thread_id[i],NULL);
00152         }
00153 
00154         cout<<"\n****************"<<match_count<<"times occurrences found**********";
00155         return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00156 
00157 }
